assumerole.name: AssumeRole
assumerole.description: Grants permission to obtain a set of temporary security credentials that you can use to access AWS resources that you might not normally have access to

assumerolewithsaml.name: AssumeRoleWithSAML
assumerolewithsaml.description: Grants permission to obtain a set of temporary security credentials for users who have been authenticated via a SAML authentication response

assumerolewithwebidentity.name: AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity
assumerolewithwebidentity.description: Grants permission to obtain a set of temporary security credentials for users who have been authenticated in a mobile or web application with a web identity provider

decodeauthorizationmessage.name: DecodeAuthorizationMessage
decodeauthorizationmessage.description: Grants permission to decode additional information about the authorization status of a request from an encoded message returned in response to an AWS request

getaccesskeyinfo.name: GetAccessKeyInfo
getaccesskeyinfo.description: Grants permission to obtain details about the access key id passed as a parameter to the request

getcalleridentity.name: GetCallerIdentity
getcalleridentity.description: Grants permission to obtain details about the IAM identity whose credentials are used to call the API

getfederationtoken.name: GetFederationToken
getfederationtoken.description: Grants permission to obtain a set of temporary security credentials (consisting of an access key ID, a secret access key, and a security token) for a federated user

getservicebearertoken.name: GetServiceBearerToken
getservicebearertoken.description: Grants permission to obtain a STS bearer token for an AWS root user, IAM role, or an IAM user

getsessiontoken.name: GetSessionToken
getsessiontoken.description: Grants permission to obtain a set of temporary security credentials (consisting of an access key ID, a secret access key, and a security token) for an AWS account or IAM user

setcontext.name: SetContext
setcontext.description: Grants permission to set context keys on a STS session

setsourceidentity.name: SetSourceIdentity
setsourceidentity.description: Grants permission to set a source identity on a STS session

tagsession.name: TagSession
tagsession.description: Grants permission to add tags to a STS session
